representatives.name: Mr. Tabby
representatives.features: Mr. Tabby is a calm and mature cat ready to become a loving member of your family.

representatives.name: Caesar
representatives.features: This handsome and playful young cat will become a wonderful friend.

representatives.name: Louis
representatives.features: Louis adores children, he will take care of them as the best of nannies.

representatives.name: SoftPaws
representatives.features: This adventurous and independent young kitty is a great match for a working couple.

representatives.name: Ginger
representatives.features: Ginger will purr all day long sitting at your lap; she can be a great companion to the elderly.

representatives.name: Sootica
representatives.features: Sootica is a smart but affectionate cat who dreams of a loving family, best with other animals.

representatives.name: Wendy
representatives.features: Wendy will be a great addition to any family with kids as she enjoys playing games.

representatives.name: Sunshine
representatives.features: Sunshine is a calm and affectionate little she-cat ready to purr to you after a long day.

representatives.name: Romeo
representatives.features: Romeo is a playful kitten who will grow up to be a vivid and handsome cat.

representatives.name: Senator
representatives.features: Senator is a curious and resolute cat; you will never be bored with him in the house.
